channel.title: Collabora Online - Community Page
channel.description: Recent content on Collabora Online - Community Page

item.title: Translate?
item.description: A great way to get involved. You can perfect CODE and Collabora Office apps for your language, while learning about the feature set, and how things work.

item.title: Build for iOS
item.description: Are you familiar with iOS development environment and interested to learn more while helping the project?

item.title: Contributors & Supporters
item.description: Thank you to everyone who helps move the COOL project forward!

item.title: Debug CODE
item.description: You need to enable debugging support to do any practical interactive debugging.

item.title: Build for Android
item.description: Are you familiar with Android development environment and interested to learn more while helping the project?

item.title: Build Collabora Office for Windows
item.description: On Windows and want to tinker? Build Collabora Office and level up your setup.

item.title: Build Collabora Office for Linux
item.description: Linux lover? Build Collabora Office and unleash your inner hacker.

item.title: Build Collabora Office for Mac
item.description: Got a Mac and a curious mind? Build your own Collabora Office and see the magic happen.

item.title: Build Collabora Online for Web
item.description: Are you interested in contributing but do not know where to start? Head over to the documentation or start by following these step-by-step instructions and build CODE from scratch.

item.title: Grab Your Swag
item.description: Hosting an event? Request your Collabora materials here.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: Perhaps your question is one that we have been asked before; have a read, and let us know if not.

item.title: Found a bug?
item.description: Sorry about that — but you can help us resolving it by creating a great bug report! See the steps how to do it, and file the bug on GitHub.

item.title: Communicate
item.description: A great way to get in touch, ask anything or get mentoring is through one of our official channels. . .
